level.text: The purchaser of an on-line game ticket shall be solely responsible for verifying, at the time of purchase, the accuracy, legibility and condition of the data printed on the ticket, and for determining that the ticket accurately reflects the bet placed.
The agency shall not be responsible for the following:
Tickets that are mutilated, altered, reconstituted, counterfeit in whole or in part, or tampered with in any manner;
Tickets that have not been issued in an authorized manner; or
Tickets from a book appearing on an omissions list submitted by its manufacturer.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to October 2, 1992, the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking published at 29 DCR 2202, 2211 (May 28, 1982).
